column2: title=Sotheby's Valuable Autograph Letters, Literary Manuscripts and Historical Documents 12-13 December 1977
image=[[File:Sotheby's Valuable Autograph Letters, Literary Manuscripts and Historical Documents 12-13 December 1977.jpg

column1: '''''Sotheby's Valuable Autograph Letters, Literary Manuscripts and Historical Documents 12-13 December 1977''''' is an auction catalogue from [[Sotheby's]] (London). It includes several letters by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]:
*Lot 365 (p. 182): [[Letter 154]]. The final page of the letter is reproduced.
